caption.p: Clusters formatted according to the dominant compounds identified, in varieties violetto, latifolia, minimum and lettuce, cultivated in the greenhouse conditions. ( a) Dominant compounds in var. violetto (1st and 3rd harvest) and var. latifolia (1st harvest); ( b) Dominant compounds in var. latifolia (2nd harvest) and var. minimum (1st and 2nd harvest); ( c) Dominant compounds in var. violetto (2nd harvest); ( d) Dominant compounds in var. lettuce (1st, 2nd and 3rd harvest).
